mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_ID, VIEW_LIST_LEVEL, VIEW_DETAIL_LEVEL, WRITE_LEVEL, WRITE_COMMENT_LEVEL FROM IMB_BOARD_AUTH WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT IMB_BOARD_AUTH (BOARD_ID, VIEW_LIST_LEVEL, VIEW_DETAIL_LEVEL, WRITE_LEVEL, WRITE_COMMENT_LEVEL) VALUES ( #{boardId}, #{viewListLevel}, #{viewDetailLevel}, #{writeLevel}, #{writeCommentLevel} )
mapper.update: UPDATE IMB_BOARD_AUTH SET VIEW_LIST_LEVEL = #{viewListLevel}, WRITE_LEVEL = #{writeLevel}, VIEW_DETAIL_LEVEL = #{viewDetailLevel}, WRITE_COMMENT_LEVEL = #{writeCommentLevel} WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
